GSE11341
========================================================

##按照丰核要求做报告

载入数据
```{r}
setwd("~/Projects/microarray_data/GSE11341_RAW/")
library(affy)
gse <- ReadAffy()
library(annotate)
gse_annotation <- annPkgName(gse@annotation,type="db")
biocLite(gse_annotation)
require(gse_annotation,character.only=T)
```

质量检验

```{r}
library(simpleaffy)
gse_qc <- qc(gse)
plot(gse_qc)
library(affyPLM)
gse_PLM <- fitPLM(gse)
boxplot(gse_PLM,main="NUSE",col=rainbow(23),las=3,ylim=c(0.95,1.1),whisklty=0)
Mbox(gse_PLM,main="RLE",col=rainbow(23),las=3,ylim=c(-0.4,0.4),whisklty=0)
```

均一化

```{r}
gse_rma <- rma(gse)
```
